meanings.definition: Below the minimum level or amount.
meanings.sent1: The subminimum wage was not enough to cover basic expenses.
meanings.sent2: She received a subminimum score on the test, indicating she needed to study more.
meanings.sent3: The tiny plant struggled to survive in the subminimum sunlight of the dark room.
meanings.sent4: His subminimum effort in the project resulted in a disappointing outcome.
meanings.sent5: The subminimum temperature made it difficult for the flowers to bloom.

meanings.sent1: The subminimum payment was not accepted by the landlord.
meanings.sent2: He had a subminimum amount of experience for the job.
meanings.sent3: The subminimum number of players on the team made it challenging to compete.
meanings.sent4: Her subminimum speed in the race surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The subminimum ingredients in the recipe affected the taste of the dish.
